descriptionHtml:
While playing Dawnguard I got so tired of Serana\'s constant chatter that I changed her name to \"Stupid Bitch\". I didn\'t modify any scripts or dialogue, I just changed the name displayed when you hover your crosshair on her. If the name offends you then simply do not download this mod.

INSTALLATION:
Extract the .esp file to your Skyrim data folder then activate it via the Skyrim Launcher.

COMPATABILITY:
This mod obviously requires the Dawnguard DLC. Since it only changes Serana\'s name, it should not conflict with any other mods which do not modify Serana as well.
author: Mezlo
